para1: I am a technology professional drawn to the intersection of technology, business, and human experience.
para2: In this space, a diverse set of knowledge, skills, and interests can be a valuable asset.  By employing my own such combination, I strive to deliver value in products, services, and solutions.
para3: Simply put, I like to create and I like to learn.
para4: You may find me writing code, exploring business ventures, reading old books, picking my six string, or playing the beautiful game.
